FuncDef:
The l2tp slot block enable command enables the block function for the tunnel board.
The undo l2tp slot block enable command disables the block function from the tunnel board.
By default, the block function is disabled from tunnel boards.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot where the tunnel board is inserted.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16.

ExtraInfo: If the number of tunnels established on a tunnel board reaches the upper limit, you can enable the block function for the tunnel board. Then, L2TP tunnels cannot be established on the tunnel board.
